name: Writer
description:
Description:

Find a way to finish the story.

Controls:

Use space to go to next scene

Use left mouse button for decisions

Design Issues

  • I had trouble getting the character to move during certain instances. I originally used a timer that would make the character move a bit at a time. However I ended up using a global variable instead of the in-game counter due to it counting once the game starts up.
  • I originally wanted it to be longer but I couldn't find any idea how to continue it, neither how to end it.
